TopicTitle: Is there any mod or cfg which removes checks for launchpad/runway clearances?

Articles.Content: If you try to launch a craft to the Runway while there's another craft already on the Runway, KSP makes you move or recover it first. I want to clear that check to be able to launch a craft anyway. This is partly because with Omega's Stockalike Structures, craft landed on other Runways seem to still conflict with the KSC Runway, but I'd also like to have multiple on the main Runway if possible.
I know of no such thing but, not to be Captain Obvious, you can launch vessel #1, taxi it off the runway, launch #2, and then taxi #1 back onto the runway.

On 7/26/2022 at 6:41 AM, damerell said:

I know of no such thing but, not to be Captain Obvious, you can launch vessel #1, taxi it off the runway, launch #2, and then taxi #1 back onto the runway.

The aim is to not have to do that.
